attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Local Swimming Baths across England are facing closure because Local Authorities are cutting back funding. Local Swimming baths are essential to local Communities and local schools. In some areas Local Swimming Pools are the only Local Amenity that communities have. We want the Prime Minister to Save Our Local swimming Pools!

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "save-localpools."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11928.asp

Prime Minister's Office
